photographers.name: ян булгак jan bulhak
photographers.info: Jan Bułhak (October 6, 1876, Ostashino under Novogrudok - February 4, 1950, Giżycko (Lec), Warmia-Mazury, buried in Warsaw) - Russian and Polish photographer and the photographer," Polish photography father ", one of the pioneers of Polish art photography.

photographers.name: георгий леонидович лихторович георгій леанардавіч ліхтаровіч george leonardovich likhtarovich
photographers.info: Georgy Leonidovich Likhtorovich (6 snezhnya 1947, Minsk) - Belarusian photo artist, writer. Member of the Belarusian Union of Designers (2000). Member of the Belarusian Union of Writers (2006).

photographers.name: люцыян крашэўскі lucian kraszewski люциан крашевский
photographers.info: Lucian Kraszewski (July 24, 1820, township Pruzhany, Grodno Province, now Brest Region. - February 2, 1892, Ganyatychy Hrubieshovskiy Village, Poland) - Belarusian and Polish artist, photographer.

photographers.name: анемподистов михаил владимирович міхаіл уладзіміравіч анемпадыстаў anempodistov mikhail vladimirovich
photographers.info: Mikhail Vladimirovich Anempodistov (March 16, 1964, Minsk - January 23, 2018, Minsk, Belarus) - Belarusian artist, designer, poet, cultural scientist, art historian.

photographers.name: лев урбанавич дашкевич леў урбанавіч дашкевіч ley urbanavich dashkevich
photographers.info: Lev Urbanavich Dashkevich (February 12, 1882, Minsk - December 4, 1957 Minsk) - Belarusian photo artist, scientist, inventor, publicist, teacher.

photographers.name: михаил григорьевич баразна міхаіл рыгоравіч баразна michael georgevich barazna
photographers.info: Mikhail Grigorievich Barazna (November 20, 1962, D. Rakushava, Kruglyansky District, Mogilev Region) - Belarussian art historian, art critic, photo artist.
